def_en: If someone or something satisfies you, they give you enough of what you want or need to make you pleased or contented.

def_cn: 使确信;使弄清楚;使信服
def_en: To satisfy someone that something is true or has been done properly means to convince them by giving them more information or by showing them what has been done.
If you satisfy the requirements for something, you are good enough or have the right qualities to fulfil these requirements.
